title: To Steal a Mate
description: Aria never expected to meet a male, much less be abducted by one.Generations ago, the Motherhood eradicated all males from Earth. None of the women aboard the Earhart 4500 have ever seen a male, no less one with wings. They arrive at Terra Lucifer to colonize the beautiful garden planet. The moment Aria steps off the ship, she is swept up into the air by a four-armed male. This strange alien ignites a passion inside of her unlike anything she has ever felt before. Aria must learn to understand her desires while trying to figure how to get this uncivilized male to return her to her ship before this dangerous world kills them all.Leon has only ever known the savage females of his world.There is one truth in Leonâ€™s world: females bring death. He lives in isolation, terrified of the day when the females will once again leave their borrows and seek out a mate. Leon has spent his whole life trying to hide from the females and their dangerous pheromones. While he is out gathering supplies for the coming mating season, a massive creature lands in his field, bringing with it a strange female unlike any he has seen before. She is more beautiful and fascinating than anything else Leon has ever encountered. He knows that he should run and hide, that the new female might prove to be just as murderous as those of his kind. But years of solitude make it impossible for him to resist the temptation To Steal a MateNote: This book contains sexually explicit content that is suitable only for mature readers.
